Good Comments: Great quality, excellent timing, truly a great subbing group!
Most up to date group doing this show.

Great translations, great text, great quality...especially for speedsubs! And probably the nicest subbers I've come in contact with.

I hope they will sub more shows in the future!
fast and nice subs. although no karaoke but still video quality is good as well.
Like the subbing and their early release, though they don't have Karaoke
Just awesome, to be more specific, they're accurate and decent.
Bad Comments: Poor quality sub for a group formed literally for one show. Just watching a few episodes I can tell translation check, edit and quality check were neglected.
the subs are neat, and translate quite close to the dubs
the fastest sub group with HQ !!!720p!!!
Fast and good subbing group, and with the fact they named themselves by the series' title, that's good enough! XD
Very good subs and subtitles style :) keep going with the good work guys!
They didn't do the first four episodes, they didn't make a batch, and one of them is an attention whore.
